page.title: 18THORNHILL HOUSING
page.content: In the village of Thornhill the houses vary from old to new and from little to large. There are bungalows, cottages and many houses with two storeys. In Main Street the majority of houses are about 100 years old. In Low Town and Back Yetts most are newer.Sometimes the bigger gardens are divided and someone builds a house in half of the feu. Two of the listed buildings have been turned into an antique shop. One of the cottages which used to be a butcher's shop is now a grocer's. We have counted 185 houses, 5 retail shops, 2 hotels, 1 Post Office and 2 agricultural workshops, and ofcourse 1 school.
